main event: A witness observed a bright, solid light that was compared to a star on 30/05/002 in New Matamoras, Ohio.
interesting points: The object moved silently behind a tree,The brightness of the object appeared brighter than that of a star,The edges of the object were described as fuzzy and blurred,The object's color was reported as varied,The witness reported that they had never seen a similar object before.
sighted object: a solid light in the sky
witness description: A 15-year-old male who has read books on UFOs.
